testcase.name: test_root_endpoint
testcase.failure:

testcase.name: test_signup_new_user
testcase.failure: tests/test_cryptovault_api.py:93: in test_signup_new_user assert response.status_code in [200, 201, 400], f"Signup failed: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Signup failed: {"detail":[{"type":"value_error","loc":["body","email"],"msg":"value is not a valid email address: The part after the @-sign is a special-use or reserved name that cannot be used with email.","input":"test_user_909b3818@cryptovault.test","ctx":{"reason":"The part after the @-sign is a special-use or reserved name that cannot be used with email."}}]} E assert 422 in [200, 201, 400] E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
